entries.name: rdoc_version
entries.desc: Loaded version of RDoc.  Set by ::load_rdoc

entries.name: generation_hook(installer, specs)
entries.desc: Post installs hook that generates documentation for each specification in specs

entries.name: new(spec, generate_rdoc = false, generate_ri = true)
entries.desc: Creates a new documentation generator for spec.  RDoc and ri data generation can be enabled or disabled through generate_rdoc and generate_ri respectively.

entries.name: delete_legacy_args(args)
entries.desc: Removes legacy rdoc arguments from args

entries.name: document(generator, options, destination)
entries.desc: Generates documentation using the named generator (“darkfish” or “ri”) and following the given options.

entries.name: remove()
entries.desc: Removes generated RDoc and ri data

entries.name: setup()
entries.desc: Prepares the spec for documentation generation
